name: Healing Beat
description:
FLASHING LIGHTS WARNING

Cyberpunk themed rhythm game with RPG like dungeon crawl. Play as a cute Bunny boy whose job is to heal people with music in their mind's subconscious world. Move to the rhythm, heal everyone and get the perfect score!

Move with WASD or the arrow keys

Heal by pressing A & D or left- & right-arrow keys to the rhythm while in battle
